name: Art of Rally Drift Crazy Racer
name_original: Art of Rally Drift Crazy Racer
description:
Driving a vehicle competition, better vehicles require money to unlock
Contains two modes
Season mode
As a contestant who initially ranked in 101, constantly surpassing other racers, at the end of the season, corresponding bonuses will be given based on the ranking
Racing mode
Can experience all maps and increase the limited number of opponents
